target.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "log_entry" and r.box == "$boxtag" and r.log_type == "Internet connection" )
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns:["_time", "_value", "log_type"])

targets.query:
finalMap = (tables=<-) => tables
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({
        r with _value:
          if r._field =~ /.*rate$/ then r._value * 8.0
          else if r._field =~ /.*dsl_sync_max$/ then r._value * 1000.0
          else r._value,
        _field:
          if r._field == "sendrate" then "UP"
          else if r._field == "receiverate" then "DOWN"
          else if r._field == "downstreammax" then "DOWN netto Max"
          else if r._field == "downstreamphysicalmax" then "DOWN Physical Max"
          else if r._field == "downstream_dsl_sync_max" then "DOWN DSL Sync"
          else if r._field == "upstreammax" then "UP netto Max"
          else if r._field == "upstreamphysicalmax" then "UP Physical Max"
          else if r._field == "upstream_dsl_sync_max" then "UP DSL Sync"
          else r._field
        })
      )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and
    (
        r._field == "sendrate" or
        r._field == "receiverate" or
        r._field == "downstreammax" or
        r._field == "downstream_dsl_sync_max" or
        r._field == "downstreamphysicalmax" or
        r._field == "upstreammax" or
        r._field == "upstream_dsl_sync_max" or
        r._field == "upstreamphysicalmax"
    )
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> finalMap()

finalMap = (tables=<-) => tables
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({
        r with _field:
          if r._field == "crc_errors" then "CRC Errors"
          else if r._field == "errored_seconds" then "Errored Seconds"
          else if r._field == "severely_errored_seconds" then "Severely Errored Seconds"
          else r._field
        })
      )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "$boxtag" and 
    (
        r._field == "crc_errors" or
        r._field == "errored_seconds" or
        r._field == "severely_errored_seconds"
    )
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: v.windowPeriod, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> finalMap()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "log_entry" and r.log_type != "FritzInfluxDB")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "log_type"])
  |> limit(n:5, offset: 0)

panels.description: Is there a Fritz!OS update available

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}" and r["_field"] == "upgrade_available" and r.box == "${boxtag}")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Update

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}" and r["_field"] == "linkuptime" and r.box == "${boxtag}")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}" and r["_field"] == "cpu_temp" and r.box == "${boxtag}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "cpu_utilization" )
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "${timezone}")
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "totalbytessent" )
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "${timezone}")
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "totalbytesreceived" )
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}" and r["_field"] == "num_active_host" and r.box == "${boxtag}")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${measurement}" and r["_field"] == "systemuptime" and r.box == "${boxtag}")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

import "date"
import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "${timezone}")
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -7d, stop: date.add(d: 1d, to: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and 
    (
      r._field == "totalbytesreceived" or
      r._field == "totalbytessent"
    )
  )
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1h)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1d, columns: ["_time"])

import "date"
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d, stop: date.add(d: 1h, to: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1h)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and 
    (
      r._field == "totalbytesreceived" or 
      r._field == "totalbytessent"
    )
  )
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement"])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1h)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1h)

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "${timezone}")
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and 
    (
      r._field == "totalbytesreceived" or
      r._field == "totalbytessent"
    )
  )
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1ns, columns: ["_time"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement"])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  |> timeShift(duration: 1ns, columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "totalbytessent" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "totalbytesreceived" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field =~ /^wlan._associations$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field =~ /^wlan._channel$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

finalMap = (tables=<-) => tables
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({
        r with _field:
          if r._field =~ /.*ssid/ then "Name"
          else if r._field =~ /.*status/ then "Status"
          else if r._field =~ /.*standard/ then "Standard"
          else if r._field =~ /.*channel/ then "Channel"
          else if r._field =~ /.*associations/ then "Clients"
          else r._field
        })
      )


from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field =~ /^wlan1.*$/)
  |> last()
  |> toString()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1h)
  |> finalMap()

finalMap = (tables=<-) => tables
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({
        r with _field:
          if r._field =~ /.*ssid/ then "Name"
          else if r._field =~ /.*status/ then "Status"
          else if r._field =~ /.*standard/ then "Standard"
          else if r._field =~ /.*channel/ then "Channel"
          else if r._field =~ /.*associations/ then "Clients"
          else r._field
        })
      )


from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field =~ /^wlan2.*$/)
  |> last()
  |> toString()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

  |> finalMap()

finalMap = (tables=<-) => tables
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({
        r with _field:
          if r._field =~ /.*ssid/ then "Name"
          else if r._field =~ /.*status/ then "Status"
          else if r._field =~ /.*standard/ then "Standard"
          else if r._field =~ /.*channel/ then "Channel"
          else if r._field =~ /.*associations/ then "Clients"
          else r._field
        })
      )


from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field =~ /^wlan3.*$/)

  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "ram_usage_fixed" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "ram_usage_dynamic")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "cpu_temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "energy_consumption")
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and
    (
      r._field == "external_ip" or
      r._field == "external_ipv6" or
      r._field == "model" or
      r._field == "serialnumber" or
      r._field == "softwareversion" or
      r._field == "last_auth_error" or
      r._field == "myfritz_host_name"
    ) 
  )
  |> last()
  |> toString()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({
        r with _field:
          if r._field == "external_ip" then "IPv4"
          else if r._field == "external_ipv6" then "IPv6"
          else if r._field == "model" then "Model"
          else if r._field == "serialnumber" then "Serial"
          else if r._field == "softwareversion" then "SW Version"
          else if r._field == "last_auth_error" then "Last Auth Error"
          else if r._field == "myfritz_host_name" then "MyFritz Hostname"
          else r._field
        })
      )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and
    (
      r._field == "physicallinktype" or
      r._field == "dsl_line_length" or
      r._field == "dsl_dslam_vendor" or
      r._field == "dsl_dslam_sw_version" or
      r._field == "dsl_line_mode" or
      r._field == "cable_cmts_vendor" or
      r._field == "cable_line_mode" or
      r._field == "cable_modem_version" or
      r._field == "cable_num_ds_channels" or
      r._field == "cable_num_us_channels" or
      r._field == "connection_status" or
      r._field == "last_connection_error" or
      r._field == "remote_pop"
    ) 
  )
  |> last()
  |> toString()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({
        r with _field:
          if r._field == "physicallinktype" then "Link Type"
          else if r._field == "dsl_line_length" then "DSL Line Length"
          else if r._field == "dsl_dslam_vendor" then "DSL DSLAM Vendor"
          else if r._field == "dsl_dslam_sw_version" then "DSL Model Version"
          else if r._field == "dsl_line_mode" then "DSL Line Mode"
          else if r._field == "cable_cmts_vendor" then "Cable Vendor"
          else if r._field == "cable_line_mode" then "Cable Line Mode"
          else if r._field == "cable_modem_version" then "Cable Modem Version"
          else if r._field == "cable_num_ds_channels" then "Cable Downstream Channels"
          else if r._field == "cable_num_us_channels" then "Cable Upstream Channels"
          else if r._field == "connection_status" then "Connection Status"
          else if r._field == "last_connection_error" then "Last Connection Error"
          else if r._field == "remote_pop" then "Remote Pop"
          else r._field
        })
      )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "vpn_user_num_active")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and
    (
      r._field == "ddns_domain" or
      r._field == "ddns_enabled" or
      r._field == "ddns_mode" or
      r._field == "ddns_provider_name" or
      r._field == "ddns_status_ipv4" or
      r._field == "ddns_status_ipv6"
    ) 
  )
  |> last()
  |> toString()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({
        r with _field:
          if r._field == "ddns_domain" then "Domain"
          else if r._field == "ddns_enabled" then "Enabled"
          else if r._field == "ddns_mode" then "Mode"
          else if r._field == "ddns_provider_name" then "Provider"
          else if r._field == "ddns_status_ipv4" then "Status IPv4"
          else if r._field == "ddns_status_ipv6" then "Status IPv6"
          else r._field
        })
      )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and
    (
      r._field == "vpn_user_active" or
      r._field == "vpn_user_connected" or
      r._field == "vpn_user_virtual_address" or
      r._field == "vpn_user_remote_address"
    ) 
  )
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field =~ /active_hosts_(name|mac|type|parent|port|ipv4.*|additional_text)/ )
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time", "name"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field =~ /passive_hosts_.*/ )
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time"])

list.description: Measurement name for the fritzflux data
list.label: InfluxDB measurement
list.name: measurement

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "linkuptime")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["box"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["box"])
  |> distinct(column: "box")
list.label: FritzBox
list.name: boxtag
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "linkuptime")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["box"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["box"])
  |> distinct(column: "box")

list.definition:
import "sampledata"
import "date"
// generate default timezone entry
default = sampledata.string()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: "Europe/Berlin", _time: date.time(t: 1990-01-01) }))
  |> last()

// query actual entry
query = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "fritzinfluxdb_setting_timezone")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

// join result and keep the latest (query) result
union(tables: [default, query])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> last()
list.name: timezone
list.query:
import "sampledata"
import "date"
// generate default timezone entry
default = sampledata.string()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: "Europe/Berlin", _time: date.time(t: 1990-01-01) }))
  |> last()

// query actual entry
query = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -2d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box == "${boxtag}" and r._field == "fritzinfluxdb_setting_timezone")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

// join result and keep the latest (query) result
union(tables: [default, query])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> last()
